title: About me
summary: I have been working on IT projects for several years and I consider development both a profession and a hobby. I enjoy bringing creative ideas to life, in groups or alone. In the meanwhile I always aspire to develop my knowledge in the field.
neumannDescription: During the five years spent here, I had the chance to gain knowledge in many fields of computer science, including programming, web development, database management, networking, and more. All of this was used in projects, hackathons, and competitions.
